extendedInfo.description: This is an essential app for an everyday bicyclist to a professional cyclist.  This app has it all!  Many calculations including Gear Ratio, Gear Inches, Meters of Development, Gear Speed and Skid Patch.  There is also an all inclusive table that calculates all of the combinations of rim and tires to wheel and wheel circumference.  Try different gear possibilities, or find out what cadence at a specific gear will produce the speed you want.  Check out all the information possible on specific gear combinations.  Also, compare different chainring/cog possibilities side by side by the innovative storing of the last 5 chainrings used.  This app supports many chainring, cassette/cog, tire and rim sizes.  This app can save you valuable time and money by trying different gear combinations to setup the bike how you want it.  Newly added, estimations on speed and power.  Estimate your speed based on a variety of configurable variables including power, weight, temperature, elevation, rolling resistance, wind, grade, frontal area drag and efficiency.  Great for trying to estimate times for triathlons and races!  Figure out what speed or power you will need for a specific distance. Even calculates calories and weight loss.Newly added, estimations on speed and power.  Estimate your speed based on a variety of configurable variables including power, weight, temperature, elevation, rolling resistance, wind, grade, frontal area drag and efficiency.  Great for trying to estimate times for triathlons and races!  Figure out what speed or power you will need for a specific distance. Even calculates calories and weight loss.1. Added new estimation screens that you can key in all of the relevant data.  This gives what people have been asking for of decimal values for estimation calculations.2. Various bug fixes.3. Fixed rotation issues, all screens should now fit a rotated screen.4. Various rounding and calculations were fixed with the addition of the decimal for estimations.Get it today, a must if you ride a bike!

reviews.title: OK on nexus 7
reviews.comment: Works ok A little improvement (e.g. to the power form defaults and user editable settings) would make this more usable
reviews.author: david kerfoot

reviews.title: Can\'t see it
reviews.comment: I just downloaded it.....The buttons are squished down and you can\'t read what\'s on them. While they are active, I have no idea what they say. No other buttons are active, can\'t get to settings, etc.   I guess I\'ve wasted 99 cents on worse things that a crappy app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Menus don\'t work
reviews.comment: The dropdown menus appear blank. Device is Motorola Defy with Android 2.2. Therefore apis unusable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not fully functional on Galaxy SIII
reviews.comment: The menu screen \'buttons\' dont display any text so you have to guess what they might do. The calculator does seem to work though.  Fix the issue with the buttons and it would be a great app, at the moment its a bit frustrating.
reviews.author: Alex Perkins

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: How cool is this bloody brilliant for all :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works on Galaxy S2 running ICS 4.0.4
reviews.comment: Great app. Will be flashing JB some time this week hopefully, so we\'ll see if the problem people are having is related to the S3 or a problem with Jellybean.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Poor UI
reviews.comment: User interface doesn\'t work. Un installed, but no refund offered. Avoid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Waste of money squashed display not as portrayed in playstore
reviews.author: Kenneth Porter

reviews.title: Can\'t see the buttons.
reviews.comment: Switched from a galaxy s3 to an s3 and can\'t see the buttons.  Nice app when I could see the buttons to use them.
reviews.author: Ricky Luke

reviews.title: Cycling calculator
reviews.comment: I like this app for the calculation of gear inches, etc.  I gave it a 4 out of 5 stars because for me as a touring rider the millimeter tire sizes I use are not available in the pull down menu.  The size stops at 32 but I use 35 or 38 mm.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No response
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on Galaxy S3. I emailed a screen shot to the developer but no fix and no response over a month later.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on s3
reviews.comment: Gui element formatting makes buttons illegible on galaxy s3, no longer usable after upgrading phone.
reviews.author: Phoebe Queen

reviews.title: Doesnt Display correctly on galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Yep - Version 1.5 Does not display correctly on Galaxy S3 running Android 4.0.4 Pity - would have been just what I was looking for! - Hoping for a fix too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really useful
reviews.comment: I really like this. It\'s especially great for people who can\'t afford a powertap to get a grasp of power output.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The new version sucks!
reviews.comment: I paid for Cycling Computer and loved it, right until the latest upgrade (v1.4?). Now I get a \"force close\" error every time I open it on my Epic 4G.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Worth a dollar to me, hope development continues, some feature need polishing. Estimate pages should be keyed entry and allow decimal(5.5%grade, etc)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great program for cyclists. Easy to use. A must have.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unreadable menu buttons on S3
reviews.comment: As with other comments, the menu buttons are unreadable on Samsung Galaxy S3. Trial and error needed to find the one you want. Shame as this spoils an otherwise great app. Fix needed please!!
reviews.author: Mick Edensor

reviews.title: Samsung S3 Screen issue
reviews.comment: I really find this app usefull as a cycling industry user. There is an existing problem with a distorted home screen on ver 1.5 that makes buttons unreadable that needs a fix, but a great app.
reviews.author: Mike Hetherington

reviews.title: Display problems
reviews.comment: Display is corrupt on galaxy nexus -refund
reviews.author: A Google User
